subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Doping (Sports)
Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: Nearly 2,000 doping tests have been conducted in Vancouver, and the head of the I.O.C.’s medical commission called the lack of positive cases “very promising.”
snippet: Nearly 2,000 doping tests have been conducted in Vancouver, and the head of the I.O.C.’s medical commission called the lack of positive cases “very promising.”
